name: neocopyrighter
description: Automatically insert copyright and licence notice in source files

commands.title: NeoCopyrighter: Add user copyright notice to current file
NeoCopyrighter: Add MIT License copyright notice to current file

neocopyrighter.author.copyrightHolderNam.description: Specifies the name(s) of the copyright holder(s).

neocopyrighter.author.copyrightHolderYea.description: Specifies the date(s) of copyright claims in the same order as the respective copyright holder names; defaults to current year otherwise.

neocopyrighter.licence.identifier.description: Specifies the type of licence (by identifier) to reference in copyright notices.

neocopyrighter.licence.includeFullForm.description: Choose whether or not to include the full form of the licence or not - only applies if `neocopyrighter.licence` is not `none`.

neocopyrighter.licenceFile.includeLicenc.description: Choose whether or not to include a reference to a project licence file for more information.

neocopyrighter.licenceFile.automatically.description: Choose whether or not to automatically detect a licence file - only applies if `neocopyrighter.licenceFile.includeLicenceFiles` is true.

neocopyrighter.licenceFile.customLicence.description: Set a custom licence file path relative to the workspace folder. If not empty, this overrides `neocopyrighter.licenceFile.automaticallyDetectLicenceFile`.

neocopyrighter.copyrightNoticeStyle.plac.description: Choose whether or not to place the 'All rights reserved' phrase on a new line. Only applies when `neocopyrighter.author.copyrightHolderNames` is not empty.

neocopyrighter.commentStyle.cStyle.headP.description: Comment prefix for the first line of comment blocks in C-style languages.

neocopyrighter.commentStyle.cStyle.bodyP.description: Comment prefix for the middle lines of comment blocks in C-style languages.

neocopyrighter.commentStyle.cStyle.tailP.description: Comment prefix for the last line of comment blocks in C-style languages.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
